behavior.sectionTitle: Your trading history hides habits you won't admit
behavior.sectionSubtitle: Portfolio trackers show your holdings. Only MiaoFi reads your trading history like a behavioral psychologist.

fomo.label: FOMO Chasing
fomo.finding: You didn't buy SOL when it dropped from $295 to $120. You chased it at $180 after a 50% bounce. Now it's $80. You're down 56%.
fomo.prescription: All 3 of your buys came after 30%+ price rebounds. If you had DCA'd at $120 (weekly buys), your cost basis would be $105, not $180. Set a rule: only add positions below the 30-day moving average.
fomo.rule: üìã Rule: only add positions below the 30-day MA

disposition.label: Won't Take Profit, Won't Cut Losses
disposition.finding: Your ETH went from the $4,900 peak to $2,000 with zero sells in between. $19,000 in unrealized gains turned into $10,000 in unrealized losses. This isn't the first time ‚Äî 3 tokens went through the full gain-to-loss cycle in the past 12 months.
disposition.prescription: If you'd sold half your ETH at $4,000 (-18% from peak), you'd have locked in $5,000 profit. The other half at today's price loses $5,000. Net: $0 (breakeven) vs your current -$10,000.
disposition.rule: üìã Rule: auto-trim 1/3 of any position up 50%+

panic.label: Panic Selling
panic.finding: On Feb 3, 2026, ETH dropped 8% in a single day. You sold your entire position near the bottom. Price rebounded 11% within 3 days. You sold the floor. This happened twice in the past 6 months.
panic.prescription: Cost of panic selling: you'd have $2,400 more if you'd held. If you're worried about downside, the right move is staged selling, not one-click liquidation. Set a rule: max 25% of position per sell, wait 24 hours before the next move.
panic.rule: üìã Rule: max 25% per sell, wait 24 hours

realDiagnoses.degenDiagnosis: Bought 5 meme coins in one week. 3 went to zero. The other 2 are down 60%. It's not bad luck ‚Äî there's zero risk management logic
realDiagnoses.degenFootnote: Based on public on-chain data ¬∑ Verifiable via Solscan
